title-group.article-title: APPROXIMATION OF THE EIGENVALUE PROBLEM FOR THE TIME HARMONIC MAXWELL SYSTEM BY CONTINUOUS LAGRANGE FINITE ELEMENTS

abstract.p: We propose and analyze an approximation technique for the Maxwell eigenvalue problem using H 1 -conforming finite elements. The key idea consists of considering a mixed method controlling the divergence of the electric field in a fractional Sobolev space H -α with $\mathrm{\alpha }\in \left(\frac{1}{2},1\right)$ . The method is shown to be convergent and spectrally correct.
